document_data.name: Xalith Masq'il'yr
document_data.mainbody: '''Xalith Masq'il'yr''' was a [[drow]] trader living in [[Gracklstugh]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Xalith was a trader in Gracklstugh and an ally of [[House Mizzrym]] of [[Menzoberranzan]].
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], Xalith was contacted by [[Ilvara Mizzrym]] and ordered to search for an adventuring party that had escaped [[Velkynvelve]].
